channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
hey guys :p ok my question about hp bars :)
ok in my server the hp bars showing numbers like 52\99 (got pic) [URL=http://img141.imageshack.us/i/87399818.png/][IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/3358/87399818.png[/img][/URL] [b] but i dont like it,i want regular hp bars but same graphic..[/b]
like this:
[img]http://i445.photobucket.com/albums/qq177/hello-bye123/capture_01062009_120417.jpg[/img]
please tell me what to do :) if its possible :P
with thanks,FrozenLord. - - - - - -- - - - i really approciate your help guys !

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @FrozenLord FrozenLord
item.description:
@FrozenLord wrote:

dude I didn`t get it…
can you explain please?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @lostpd lostpd
item.description:
@lostpd wrote:

with your client go to the top where you can see the menu bars, click around look for either: HP above heads, or options, inside options (if their is options) just click hp above heads off, what would help is a link to where you got your client so i can tell you exactly where to click/what to type though

Read full topic
